comments.author: Rahat Latif
comments.content:
though i m a grt admirer of your travelogue, but may i draw ur attention on some points need-amendments/corrections.

1:22 pm: its is Burhan interchange not Durhan

Gilgit-Skardu distance is 190-195kms

i hope this would help acquiring more info about this trek in the near future

regards

comments.author: KARAM TALPUR
comments.content:
DEAR MR. KHALID OMER PLS LET ME KNOW HOW MUCH MONEY PORTERS DEMAND FOR EACH STAGE AS YOU HAVE MENTIONED HERE AND FOR HOW MUCH AMOUNT OF WEIGHT.

THIS INFO WILL HELP A LOT OF POTENTIAL HIKERS IN FUTURE TO CONCORDIA

comments.author: KO
comments.content: The entire costing for the trip is online here.

comments.author: Nadeem Ahmad
comments.content: Wonderfully written by you. I did this trek in 2003 as part of an Italian mountaineering expedition, though the opposite way and started from Askole and went to Gasherbrum I & II and later to Broad Peak and after three months in the  mountains went to Hushe passing through Concordia and Gondogoro La.

comments.author: Phineas Anderson
comments.content: Thanks for taking the time to write your travelogue. It would of been good to see photos at each stage as you did initially. Good job!
